medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant pain for 4 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced right lower quadrant pain that began 4 days prior to admission, along with anorexia. There were no symptoms of nausea or vomiting, and the patient denied constipation, diarrhea, hematemesis, bloating, cramping, melena, or bright red blood per rectum. The pain intensity and specifics over time were not detailed beyond this initial report.
